title: Why in the hell is Darius buffed
body: The patch notes might as well say "Darius has the ability to fuck over their laner really hard, so we want more of that lol"

replies.body: thats just Riot not caring about the mass majority of people who play the game because they care about pro play more tbh this fuck people who already cant stand Darius but might also kinda fuck over the people who play him no doubt that champion is going to be perma banned even more than he already is so the people that play him wont even be able to play him
People seem to forget that Darius wasn't even OP and had only a semi-viabke winrate. He deserved buffs, but these buffs arguably were not the right ones.
